name: OneTeam
description:
We help business owners to interpret their wishes and requirements in the web, develop real estate projects, CRM/EPR business management automation systems, create such websites: business cards, corporate systems, e-commerce and e-learning systems, MVP and etc.

5 years and 7 months of our experience in web product development let you use our knowledge and apply them to work on your project, avoiding trivial errors at each stage from the formation of an idea to the launch of the project. Writing a semantic and well-documented code will allow your project to develop effectively in terms of SEO and to supplement the functionality without loss of quality.
We provide technical support for patching and updating existing web projects.
You may see details here - http://oneteam.in.ua/.
